faq-one-content: Shipping costs depend on the delivery location and the weight of the item. For more information, please contact us via WhatsApp.
faq-two-content: Shipping time varies depending on your location. Generally, delivery takes between 1-7 business days after payment is confirmed.
faq-three-title: Can I return a purchased item?
faq-four-title: Do the products come with a warranty?
faq-four-content: Yes, all electronic products we sell come with an official manufacturer warranty. The warranty duration varies depending on the product. Please check the product description for more details.
faq-five-title: Is there a discount for bulk purchases?
faq-five-content: We offer special discounts for bulk purchases. Please contact our customer service team for more details on offers and conditions.
faq-six-title: How can I contact customer service?
faq-six-content: You can contact our customer service via email: jaya_elektronik@yahoo.co.id or phone: 0813-5653-0099.
faq-eight-title: What should I do if I receive a defective product?
faq-eight-content: For technical defects, claims must be made within 24 hours. We ensure that the physical condition of the received item is not defective.
faq-nine-title: What should I do if the product I received does not match my order?
faq-nine-content: We ensure this will not happen, as every item goes through a thorough inspection before delivery and upon receipt by the customer.
faq-ten-title: Are electronic products sold already inclusive of tax?
faq-ten-content: Yes, all prices listed on our site include taxes. You do not need to worry about additional costs when making a purchase.
